TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UriBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供統一資源識別元 (URI) 的自訂建構函式，並修改 類別的 URI。

span.span: Provides a custom constructor for uniform resource identifiers (URIs) and modifies URIs for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供便利的方式來修改內容而不需要建立新的執行個體每一項修改的執行個體。The class provides a convenient way to modify the contents of a instance without creating a new instance for each modification. 屬性會提供讀取/寫入存取權的唯讀屬性，以便它們可以修改。The properties provide read/write access to the read-only properties so that they can be modified.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式建立的新執行個體類別及其屬性，初始化，如下所示。The default constructor creates a new instance of the class with its properties initialized as follows. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |FragmentFragment|| |主機Host|「 回送 」"loopback"| |密碼Password|| |路徑Path|"/""/"| |連接埠Port|-1-1| |查詢Query|| |配置Scheme|「 http 」"http"| |使用者名稱UserName||

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string uri) cil managed

span.span: A URI string.

summary.span: 使用指定的 URI，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別搭配， ， ， ， ， ，以及屬性設定為指定的`uri`.This constructor initializes a new instance of the class with the , , , , , , and properties set as specified in `uri`. 如果`uri`未指定的配置，則配置會預設為"http:"。If `uri` does not specify a scheme, the scheme defaults to "http:".

span.span: is .

Docs.exception:
在適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET 或可攜式類別庫中，改為攔截基底類別例外狀況 。In the .NET for Windows Store apps or the Portable Class Library, catch the base class exception, , instead.
是零長度字串或只包含空格。
is a zero length string or contains only spaces.
-或--or- 剖析常式偵測到格式無效的配置。The parsing routine detected a scheme in an invalid form.
-或--or- 剖析器在不是使用「檔案」配置的 URI 中偵測到兩個以上連續的斜線。The parser detected more than two consecutive slashes in a URI that does not use the "file" scheme.
-或--or- 不是有效的 URI。 is not a valid URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體以初始化屬性設定為`schemeName`並屬性設定為`hostName`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName` and the property set to `hostName`. 會初始化為值-1 表示預設連接埠，應該使用的配置，而屬性設定為斜線字元 （/）。 is initialized to the value -1 to indicate the default port for the scheme should be used, and the property is set to the slash character (/). ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，包含 URI http://www.contoso.com/。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com/. remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體以初始化屬性設定為`schemeName`，則屬性設定為`hostName`，和屬性設定為`portNumber`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, and the property set to `portNumber`. 屬性設定為斜線字元 （/）。The property is set to the slash character (/). 如果`portNumber`設為值為-1，這表示是預設通訊埠值`scheme`用以連接到`host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，包含 URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/. remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有初始化執行個體屬性設定為`schemeName`，則屬性設定為`hostName`，則屬性設定為`portNumber`，和屬性設定為`pathValue`.The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, the property set to `portNumber`, and the property is set to `pathValue`. 如果`extraValue`開頭是數字符號 （#），然後設定為`extraValue`。If `extraValue` begins with a number sign (#), then is set to `extraValue`. 如果`extraValue`加上問號 （？），然後開始設定為`extraValue`。If `extraValue` begins with a question mark (?), then is set to `extraValue`. 如果`portNumber`設為值為-1，這表示是預設通訊埠值`scheme`用以連接到`host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，包含 URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm#top。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm#top. [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不是 也不是 ，有效片段識別項不是以數字符號 (#) 開頭，有效查詢字串也不是以問號 (?) 開頭。

span.span: is neither nor , nor does a valid fragment identifier begin with a number sign (#), nor a valid query string begin with a question mark (?).
is less than -1 or greater than 65,535.

summary.span: 取得或設定 URI 的片段部分。

span.span: Gets or sets the fragment portion of the URI.
The fragment portion of the URI.

value.span: 片段識別項 ("#") 會加入至片段的開頭。

span.span: The fragment identifier ("#") is added to the beginning of the fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含下列片段中的標記 （#） 的 URI，包括標記本身的任何文字。The property contains any text following a fragment marker (#) in the URI, including the marker itself. 設定時屬性，片段標記新增至它的值。When setting the property, the fragment marker is added to its value. **附註**版本 1.0 和 1.1 版的.NET Framework 中，設定屬性設為任何值，包括`null`、 清除屬性，並設定屬性設`null`或是清除屬性。**Note** In version 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, setting the property to any value, including `null`, cleared the property, and setting the property to `null` or to cleared the property. 在 2.0 版中，不過，和屬性無關。In version 2.0, however, the and properties are independent. **請注意**不將字串附加至這個屬性的直接。**Note** Do not append a string directly to this property. 如果長度大於 1，擷取為字串屬性值、 移除前置的井字號、 附加新的查詢字串，和設定組合的字串屬性。If the length of is greater than 1, retrieve the property value as a string, remove the leading pound sign, append the new query string, and set the property with the combined string. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 URI"http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main」。The following example creates the URI "http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main". [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 URI 參考的資源路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the resource referenced by the URI.
The path to the resource referenced by the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含伺服器用來解析要求資訊的路徑資訊。The property contains the path information that the server uses to resolve requests for information. 這通常是在伺服器的檔案系統; 所需的資訊路徑雖然它也可以指出應用程式或指令碼，則伺服器必須執行提供的資訊。Typically this is the path to the desired information on the server's file system; although it also can indicate the application or script that the server must run to provide the information. 配置、 主機名稱或 URI 的查詢部分不包含路徑資訊。The path information does not include the scheme, host name, or query portion of the URI. 屬性一律會傳回至少一個斜線 （/）。The property always returns at least a slash (/).

summary.span: 取得或設定 URI 的連接埠編號。

span.span: Gets or sets the port number of the URI.
The port number of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接埠號碼定義連絡 URI 參考主機的通訊協定連接埠。The port number defines the protocol port for contacting the host referenced in the URI. 如果未指定連接埠的 URI 一部分屬性會傳回-1，表示通訊協定配置的預設連接埠值將用於連線至主機的值。If a port is not specified as part of the URI, the property returns the value of -1 to indicate that the default port value for the protocol scheme will be used to connect to the host. 如果屬性設定為-1 值，這就表示通訊協定配置的預設連接埠值將用於連線至主機。If the property is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the protocol scheme will be used to connect to the host.

exception.span: 連接埠不能設定為小於 -1 或大於 65,535 的值。

span.span: The port cannot be set to a value less than -1 or greater than 65,535.

summary.span: 取得或設定 URI 所包含的任何查詢資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets any query information included in the URI.

span.span: The query information included in the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含在 URI 中所包含的任何查詢資訊。The property contains any query information included in the URI. 查詢資訊會以問號 （？） 的路徑資訊分開，並繼續到 URI 的結尾。Query information is separated from the path information by a question mark (?) and continues to the end of the URI. 傳回的查詢資訊包含前置問號。The query information returned includes the leading question mark. 查詢資訊會根據 RFC 2396 逸出。The query information is escaped according to RFC 2396. **附註**版本 1.0 和 1.1 版的.NET Framework 中，設定屬性設為任何值，包括`null`、 清除屬性，並設定屬性設`null`或是清除屬性。**Note** In version 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, setting the property to any value, including `null`, cleared the property, and setting the property to `null` or to cleared the property. 在 2.0 版中，不過，和屬性無關。In version 2.0, however, the and properties are independent. **請注意**不將字串附加至這個屬性的直接。**Note** Do not append a string directly to this property. 如果長度大於 1，擷取為字串屬性值、 移除前置問號、 附加新的查詢字串，和設定組合的字串屬性。If the length of is greater than 1, retrieve the property value as a string, remove the leading question mark, append the new query string, and set the property with the combined string. ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性。The following example sets the property. [!code-cpp[UriBuilderSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/UriBuilderSample/cpp/main.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UriBuilderSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/UriBuilderSample/cs/main.cs#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the scheme name of the URI.
The scheme of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出有效的配置名稱屬性。The following table lists the valid scheme names for the property. |配置Scheme|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |檔案file|資源是在本機電腦上的檔案。The resource is a file on the local computer.| |ftpftp|透過 FTP 存取資源。The resource is accessed through FTP.| |gophergopher|透過 Gopher 通訊協定存取資源。The resource is accessed through the Gopher protocol.| |httphttp|透過 HTTP 存取的資源。The resource is accessed through HTTP.| |httpshttps|資源是透過 SSL 加密的 HTTP 存取。The resource is accessed through SSL-encrypted HTTP.| |mailtomailto|資源電子郵件地址，並透過 SMTP 存取。The resource is an email address and is accessed through SMTP.| |新聞news|透過 NNTP 存取資源。The resource is accessed through NNTP.|

exception.span: 配置不能設定為不正確的配置名稱。

span.span: The scheme cannot be set to an invalid scheme name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回所指定 執行個體的顯示字串。

span.span: Returns the display string for the specified instance.

returns.span: 字串，包含 的未逸出顯示字串。

span.span: The string that contains the unescaped display string of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示字串包含屬性值，但前提屬性設定，或已指定連接埠時建構使用接受連接埠編號的參數，但大小寫不同的方法時.property 值時，已設定為-1 值上，以指出預設的連接埠。The display string contains the property value if the property was set or the port was specified when the was constructed using of the methods that accept a port number parameter except for the case when the .property value was set to a value of -1 to indicate the default port. 顯示字串不包含屬性值，但前提未設定屬性並不是連接埠時指定建構。The display string does not contain the property value if the property was not set and a port was not specified when the was constructed. 顯示字串也不包含屬性值，如果建構函式的屬性或連接埠號碼設定為-1 值。The display string also does not contain the property value if the property or port number for the constructor was set to a value of -1.

para.span: 在適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET 或可攜式類別庫中，改為攔截基底類別例外狀況 。

span.span: In the .NET for Windows Store apps or the Portable Class Library, catch the base class exception, , instead.

exception.span: 執行個體的密碼不正確。

span.span: The instance has a bad password.
